segments.en: “Mendicants, I will teach you a bad person and a worse person,

segments.pli: Sappurisañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi sappurisena sappurisatarañca.
segments.en: a good person and a better person.
And what is a bad person?

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco micchādiṭṭhiko hoti … pe … micchāsamādhi—
segments.en: It’s someone who has wrong view, wrong thought, wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, and wrong immersion.
This is called a bad person.
And what is a worse person?

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco micchādiṭṭhiko hoti … pe … micchāsamādhi, micchāñāṇī, micchāvimutti—
segments.en: It’s someone who has wrong view, wrong thought, wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, wrong immersion, wrong knowledge, and wrong freedom.
This is called a worse person.
And what is a good person?

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco sammādiṭṭhiko hoti … pe … sammāsamādhi—
segments.en: It’s someone who has right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion.
This is called a good person.
And what is a better person?

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco sammādiṭṭhiko hoti … pe … sammāsamādhi, sammāñāṇī, sammāvimutti—
segments.en: It’s someone who has right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, right immersion, right knowledge, and right freedom.
This is called a better person.”

suttaplex.blurb: A bad person practices wrong eightfold path, and a worse person has wrong knowledge and wrong liberation, too; a good person is the opposite.
